page.title: 02MUCH MARCLE VILLAGE
page.content: The Village of Much Marcle The village is situated four miles from Ledbury in the county of Hereford and Worcester. It is a small village surrounded by rich agricultural land that supports a variety of crops.The area is well known for its cider apple orchards and Westons Cider factory is situated in the village. There are two houses of historical interest namely Hellens and Homme House. The people of Much Marcle are mainly involved in agriculture, cider production or are retired. There is little employment in the area and this has caused a decline in the village population. There has been little development recently but hopefully this will come in the future.
